item.description:

item.title: Outside 50’Well Walk, 10th July
item.description:
At 23.00 on Thursday night there are 12 abandoned bikes and scooters from Lime, Forest and Voi. Not only are these in addition to the ones parked legally within the zone, but they are thrown across the road and a private drive making it hazardous for cars and any delivery vans trying to pass. This is a persistent problem that is not being resolved by sending people to straighten the bikes or fining cyclists a nominal amount for not parking in the specified area. Please can this parking zone be more clearly marked with physical boundaries that will not allow people to leave bikes or scooter outside of the zone. Please can it be monitored and controlled more regularly. Please can Camden consider moving it to a safer part of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Well Walk, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish uncollected yet again, 10th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Brewer Street, City of Westminster

item.title: Black plastic bag contain dog fouling and dog food was thrown into my front garden., 10th July
item.description:
A black plastic bag containing dog fouling and food was thrown into my front garden. The plastic bag was split and the contents were scattered that attract flies, maggots, ants , etc. As far as I am aware, the fly tipping was carried out between 21:30 to 22:30.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Horsa Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
